explains: adv. 在地理上，地理学上

sentences.en: Although geographically linked, the two provinces have long fought for political ascendancy.
sentences.cn: 尽管地理相连，这两个省长久以来都在为政治优势而竞争。

sentences.en: These audiences will be more diverse and geographically dispersed than in the past.
sentences.cn: 这些观众将比过去更加多样化，地理呈分散形式。

sentences.en: It is geographically more diverse than any other continent.
sentences.cn: 它在地理上比其他任何大陆都更具多样性。
